configuration.subtitle: The European Pollutant Release and Transfer Register

configuration.disclaimer: Disclaimer The European Commission maintains this website to enhance public access to the European pollutant release and transfer register. Our goal is to keep this information timely and accurate. If errors are brought to our attention, we will try to correct them. However the Commission accepts no responsibility or liability whatsoever with regard to the information on this site.
